desc: The Museum Shop at Historic Huguenot Street specializes in unique local interest and artisan gifts, including fine art, jewelry, and home goods. Take home a piece of the street with our HHS Souvenir items.

layout.text: The Museum Shop at Historic Huguenot Street offers a variety of Gifts, Souvenirs, and Books that are perfect for any Gifting occasion. Shop Small with us and take home your own piece of the street.
